onlineObj.heading: Patient Wallet, Membership & Subscription Plans
onlineObj.para: The patient wallet takes the headache out of managing packages and event specials, pre-purchases and discounts so you never lose track over time. Multiple membership programs are simple to execute- they can be easily accessed by the provider in the room, right from the POS. And, subscription plans turn ongoing treatment options into monthly visits and predictable  payments.
onlineObj.notes: No Credit Card Required, 14 Day Free Trial
